yameku wisin athkaragena athi sowan aadi palayan pilibandawa prasiddhiye prakasha kirima thulin mekala sitina pudgalayanwa dharma margayata yomukara ganimata pitu balayak laba diya hakida?(awi) budu rajanan wahanse wisin yameku kamathi nam thama wisin awaboda kara gath sowan aadi palayan prakashayata path kirimata awasara di athi namuth ada siti yayi apata hagena boho swamin wahansela ese prakasha nokirimehi hethuwa kumak wiya hakida?(awi) apata wadagath deya yamekuge sowan aadi palayan dana ganimada nathahoth apa hata sowan aadi palayan ath wida ganima pinisa wana prayogika wadapiliwela dana ganimada?(awi) yameku wisin laba athi sowan aadi palayan dana ganima pinisa wana apathula pawathina kuthuhalayehi (wichikichchawa) nathiwima apa wisinma sowan pala awabodaya labana thekma pawathinu athida?(awi) niwana labima pinisa waradi kramayangen midi(silabbatha paramasa) niwaradi kramaya anugamanaya karamin (kalyana mithra asura, saddharma shrawanaya, yoniso manasikaraya saha dhammanu dhamma prathipadawa) thama thula pawathina sakkaya dittiya nathi kara ganima thulin pamanakma siduwana bawa prathamayen tharkikawa dana ganimen anathuruwa yameku thula anekun thula pawathina sowan aadi palayan dana ganime uwamanawa pahawi yamin eya thama thulinma dana ganime uwamanawa athiwima thulin kriyathmaka wimen pamanak yamekuta mema wichikichchawen midiya haki bawa.(awi) sabbasawa suthrayehi wisthara kirima.

mema tharagaye di santha silwesthara widuhale nimesha mendis lakunu 38ta kadulu 6k laba gaththeya.santha silwesthara widuhala palamu inima oowar 70 kadi kadudu 9kata lakunu 250 yi.sunil samarananda 70,waruna wijesinha 48, harsha madushan 44 (isuru wirasinha 69ta 4, heshan gamage 49ta 3)widyartha widuhala palamu inima oowar 53.2 kadi siyallanma dawi 142yi.ruwan bandara 24, rawindra disanayaka 45, keshan gamage 37 (nimesha mendis 38ta 6, waruna wijesinha 39ta 2)widyartha widuhala dewani inima oowar 54 kadi kadulu 4 kata lakunu 134yi.thilina rupasena 64, keshan gamage nodawi 41 (sumeda disanayaka 20ta 2)dewani inimedi widyartha widuhala ek awasthawaka kadulu 3ta lakunu 22kwa thibini.

ithihasaye samanatha nirmanaya wana aakaraya ek athekin hasyajanaka wanneya.pasugiya irida (pebarawari 26) mawbima sathiantha puwathpathata sammukha sakachchawak labadi thibu wiyapath wasudewa nanayakkara jathika prashnaya sambandhawa aanduwa jathiwadi lesa katayuthu karana bawata masiwili naga thibuni.kanthale akkara harasiyayak rajapaksha sahodarayin wisin samagamakata wikinimata daru prayanthayak pilibada da hethema ehidi paminili kota thibuni.thama rajya bhasha amathiwaraya lesa siyaluma rajya aayathanawala namapuwaru bhasha thrithwayenma thibiya yuthu bawata thindu kalath aarakshaka lekamwaraya ema thiranaya kisidu lesakin nothakana bawata ohu puwathpath idiriye nokkadu naga thibune sathi kihipayakata peradiya.
